summary:
This is no longer needed - The 4Gig patch is now included in the latest official update.
Bben46

Skyrim Universal 4GB Memory Patch. Make the most of Skyrim without 2GB limitation!
descriptionHtml:
This is no longer needed - The 4Gig patch is now included in the latest official update.
Bben46

Skyrim Memory Patch enables Skyrim to use 4GB (instead of 2GB max) so you can get better performance and ton of other things when not restricted by 2GB memory cap.

This is a MULTI patch and it will work on any game language or version.

MALWARE FREE! Read the included "Readme.html"!

NOTE: To reduce file size, ASPack was used. It is a EXE Compressor and some anti-virus programs see it as "malware". I asure you it is not. You can run the exe on www.virustotal.com and see that there is nothing. So if you get some stupid error while launching the patch, it means AV disabled it. Pause your AV, Patch, Resume AV.
author: argie
